location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 1557: William Henry Wathen, Chief Secretary to Government, Bombay, to The Acting Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: In this letter, William Henry Wathen, Chief Secretary to Government, Bombay, writes to the Acting Resident in the Persian Gulf to acknowledge receipt of his letter, dated 17 June 1837, which contained a copy of a letter from the British Agent at Shargah [Sharjah] communicating the details of the attack and capture of Adeed by the Beniyas [Bani Yas].
